title: Amazon Essentials Men's Denim Shirt Long Sleeve - Regular-Fit Denim Shirt
description: REGULAR FIT: Experience comfort with our men's denim shirt offering a relaxed fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist, delivering a tailored style
LIGHTWEIGHT DENIM: Crafted from 7.8 oz 100% cotton, this durable denim shirt for men is breathable and ideal for wearing throughout all four seasons
VERSATILE STYLE: A denim button down shirt men can style as a wardrobe essential, ideal for layering over a t-shirt or wearing buttoned up
WESTERN DESIGN DETAILS: This classic men's denim shirt features a spread collar, center placket with snap buttons, and double flap chest pockets
ADAPTABLE CUFFS: This mens denim shirt is designed with adjustable two-button barrel cuffs for a custom fit and comfort, whether you prefer them rolled up or down

Crafted from lightweight 100% cotton, this men's denim shirt combines durability and comfort for year-round wear. With traditional western styling, it features a spread collar, snap button closure, angled yoke details, and double flap chest pockets for both style and functionality. The regular fit ensures comfortable wear, making it perfect for everyday use. Layer it over a t-shirt for a casual look or button it up for a polished feel. The adjustable two-button barrel cuffs enhance ease of movement. Elevate your collection with this essential long sleeve western shirt, ideal for any denim enthusiast.
